#Text=Wikinews interviews You-peng Wang of Taipei Electrical Commercial Association
#Text=Sunday , November 11 , 2007
#Text=Besides becoming a political stomping ground for the Pan-Green and Pan-Blue coalitions , there are other changes from past years of Taipei Audio Video Fair ( TAVF ) .

#Text=With those changes in mind , Wikinews reporter Rico Shen interviewed You-peng Wang , chairman of the Taipei Electrical Commercial Association ( TECA ) , the main organizer of TAVF , about the 60th year anniversary of TECA and the changes to the show .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Part 1 : Yuanshan Hall in The Grand Hotel
#Text=Rico Shen : This show features exhibition at the twin halls , The Grand Hotel and Taipei World Trade Center , why did TECA decide to exhibit at these two halls ?
#Text=Wang :

#Text=In past years of TAVF , many participants promoted subwoofers , loudspeakers , and AV-media devices for sale , but some world-class Taiwanese companies may need good environment for the Hi-End experiences .
#Text=As of this year , you can see some exhibitors imported a truck container house or rented a guest room for soundproof and high quality experiences and to serve senior AV-media consumers .
#Text=Rico Shen : Particularly the Hi-End quality is the best arrangement for TECA .
#Text=Also , I sincerely congratulate TECA for the 60th year anniversary .
#Text=By the way , what are the changes in Taiwan 's AV-media industry ?
#Text=Wang :
#Text=In the past , some Taiwanese companies served as agencies and foundries for international manufacturers .
#Text=They used original design manufacturers ( ODM ) , manufacturing for other brands .
#Text=Now , local brands and products ( OEM ) with good quality are increasingly marketed to the world , receiving praise by world-class professional media outside of Taiwan .
#Text=We at TECA are proud of this success .
#Text=Rico Shen : In recent press conferences , some gaming and video companies cooperated with AV-media companies for high-definition and quality promotion .
#Text=It caused some companies to become notable .
#Text=What does TECA think about this trend and fashion ?
#Text=Does TECA support this way of promotion or cooperating ?
#Text=Wang :
#Text=We are extremely encouraged by our member companies who cooperate with different companies from the other industries like gaming , video , and information technology .
#Text=I believe they 've seen good factors at high-definition AV-media infrastructure in Taiwan .
#Text=Part 2 : TWTC Hall ( Taipei World Trade Center )

#Text=Before returning to TWTC , Wang mentioned on the effectiveness of soundproofing , after a visit to a container house , some exhibitors thought soundproofing to be a key factor when experiencing loss-less Hi-End sound and said :
#Text=" We must provide the best experience and conditions to show the greatest performances of loudspeakers " .
#Text=The interview below mentions the " quality conception " .

column1: #Text=Rico Shen :

#Text=At the 60th year anniversary of the TECA this year , besides of the twin halls exhibition , what 's the reason for the feature of the " Global Audio & Video History Corridor " Pavilion at TWTC Hall ?

column1: #Text=Wang :
#Text=If you 're involved with the AV-media industry for the first time , you may not understand the evolution of its industry especially " old antiques " .
#Text=We made several old consumer AV-media players available to trace back on the history of the AV-media industry world-wide .

#Text=And newbies ( new consumers who just got involved with this industry ) can learn the evolution of this industry by viewing the display of notable AV-media products from the past to the present .

#Text=Rico Shen : I just forgot to say something at Yuanshan , because TAITRA and Taipei Computer Association ( TCA ) ever held " Exhibitors ' Coordination of 2008 Computex Taipei " last month , and I interviewed Enoch Du , the Secretary General of TCA .
#Text=Both of those mentioned the recent issue of traffic problems .
#Text=With the twin halls ' exhibition , how the TECA solve the traffic issue during the show ?

#Text=Wang : We [ TECA ] submitted the traffic solutions to the Department of Transportation of Taipei City Government and applied the shuttle bus service to Metropolitan Transport Corporation ( MTC ) for the visitors ' convenience to go TWTC or Yuanshan and back .
#Text=During the weekend hours , MTC will supply more shuttle buses to decrease the waiting period .

#Text=For the MRT stations , we decided to improve the MRT shuttle bus service at MRT Yuanshan Station rather than Taipei City Hall Station because Capital Bus Co. , Ltd has served the Taipei 101 shuttle bus for a long period .
#Text=Summary
#Text=Taipei Audio Video Fair in this year is different than the past years .
#Text=It is not just a " local domestic show " but conjoined education with enjoyment so that the 2007
#Text=TAVF takes advantage of the show 's contents .
#Text=The quality of a show is more valuable than the results to keep its good image with the media and the public .
